author: Anton Petrov
description:

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about a discovery of Earth's history hidden inside zircon crystals
Links:
https://journals.aps.org/prresearch/pdf/10.1103/98c3-d9j2
https://theconversation.com/tiny-crystals-in-earths-crust-have-captured-the-movement-of-the-milky-ways-spiral-arms-265396

0:00 Earth's geological history 
1:25 Solar system motion in the galaxy 
3:25 Zircon crystal and why they matter 
4:30 Specific measurements in this study 
5:40 Bizarre correlation with spiral arms and what this means 
7:10 What's happening here? 
8:45 Why this matters 
11:00 Conclusions

#galacticarm #zircon #milkywa
title: Secrets of Milky Way Galaxy Found Hidden Inside Zircon on Earth
